description:
Volkner`s Pikachu was seen in a flashback seen where Flint`s Chimchar managed to defeat Volkner`s Pikachu in their first meeting in an alleyway.
During a rematch between the two Pok√©mon, Pikachu was finally defeated Flint`s Chimchar with its powerful Iron Tail. It eventually evolved into Raichu.
name: Pikachu (Denji)
